COVID-19 Updates and Resources          Involvement  The Honors College has many opportunities to get involved, including student organizations, student service roles, publications, and honor societies to suit your interests.      Angelica Gallegos    My favorite memory from being a part of the Honors College was definitely the Honors College Ball.Â  It was a nice break from the stress of the semester and also nice to see peers and administration in a different setting where everyone was having fun.    Angelica Gallegos | B.S.
